name: Premier Inn Manchester Airport (M56/J6) Runger Lane South

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: A warm welcome from efficient staff made a good first impression.
reviews.title: Great value stop over

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was spick & span with a better level of lighting than I remember in recent years.
reviews.title: Good value stop over

reviews.text: The bathroom was spotless.
reviews.title: What you expect, but watch the extra's.

reviews.text: No noisy fan in bathroom is a plus for a good nights sleep.
reviews.title: Good nights stay

reviews.text: If clean & comfy is all you need for a quick, overnight stay, then this is the place for you.
reviews.title: Fantastic value for money

reviews.text: I'm not sure if it's supposed to be part of the service but who on earth could stand by and let a middle aged disabled woman struggle with a suitcase and bag on her own...I don't know if you know any disabled people at all? Not all of us are in wheelchairs, although I do have an obvious 'prop' of a crutch! So having struggled through reception and to the lift I now find I have a walk along a corridor to my room. So, I can either REALLY struggle with 2 items or I can struggle with one then walk all the way back for the other??? What are you thinking putting disabled rooms on the first floor and quite a walk away from the lift?? NOT ONE member of staff offered me assistance either on the way in or on the way out...which was a totally different experience from Premier Inn at Balsall Common and Rainhill!! Having said that the room itself was good and the shower excellent!
reviews.title: Helpful?

reviews.text: I also had a problem with the internet, which having paid £3 for I was a bit(well a lot!) peeved! A member of staff phoned them but by the time it was fixed it was too late to be any real use to me whatsoever! That was the second time at Premier, so I wasted £6 in all! However a problem with the telly was fixed almost immediately by a member of staff.
reviews.title: excellent airport hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: stayed at runger lane south on 7th and 8th of december 2012 for our trip to lapland.excellent service and friendly staff as usual with premier inn.booked an airport shuttle at reception for 04.30am with out any problems at all..driver there before we got down stairs waiting for us..highly recomended at a cost of only £8. would definately stay again.food excellent also,evening meal and breakfast.thanks again premier inn..
reviews.title: premier inn manchester airport runger lane south

reviews.text: the staff on arrival where vary friendly the food was very good and the staff in the resaurant where excellent the location was very good getting to the airport was really easy would definetly stay there again
reviews.title: Convenient

reviews.text: Typical Premier Inn formula - friendly and helpful staff - clean room - nice reception / bar area.
reviews.title: Great Value - close to airport

reviews.text: Fixtures and fittings were first class - compared to the shabby travelodge we stayed at no so long ago. We even paid for brekky and it was superb quality, they really live up to their advertising
reviews.title: Great value family room

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: stay here its great and no noise from the very close by airport
reviews.title: Don't take a room near the bar!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We arrived late to the hotel and with an early flight, all we wanted to do was get some sleep. At first we were greeted by a bar full of rowdy Irish folk on a bus tour playing Bingo. We were allocated a ground floor room just off the bar and could hear every number being called! As we had been informed that the Bingo would be going on until midnight, we asked to be moved.
reviews.title: Best of the Airport Hotels

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our second room was allocated without much fuss but all that was left was a disabled room (with a bathroom like an operating theatre) a couple of floors up over the main entrance. This was better but still noisy thanks to the smokers outside and people running up and down the stairs during the night.
reviews.title: Manchester airport, North or South??

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Like all other Premier Inns, this one was clean and perfectly adequate and the staff were pleasant enough, but in an airport hotel where the majority of people probably only want to sleep, it was disappointing that one group was able to dominate the hotel so noisily.
reviews.title: Another Great Night

reviews.text: Stayed here in August bust started writting reviews so catching up with all hotels I have stayed in
reviews.title: Good Prem Inn

reviews.text: I will say this is probably the best premier inn I have stayed in, good clean very large rooms, staff are very friendly and helpful.
reviews.title: One night stay before holiday
crime prevention!!
reviews.text: Breakfast is nice as well.
If you want a good hotel close to the airport then you would be daft not to consider this Hotel
reviews.title: Convenient for Manchester Airport

reviews.text: We stayed here for one night before flying, this is not the first time we have stayed in this hotel but this experience was a bit different from the last.
reviews.title: Let down by poor staff!!

aka: Premier Inn Manchester Airport Hotel Manchester
